text: Anadi Charan Sahu (16 April 1940 â€“ 20 January 2024) was an Indian politician from Bharatiya Janata Party. He was also a retired I.P.S. Officer. Sahu died at his home in Cuttack, Odisha, on 20 January 2024, at the age of 83 due to age related health issues. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Bharatiya Janata Party politicians Category:Politicians from Odisha
title: Anadi Charan Sahu
